overview: Learn the origins and rise of modern day hula-hooping through eight extraordinary stories of hoop devotees who have embraced it as an art form, a teaching aid, and even an instrument of redemption.  From the streets, to intimate clubs, to giant arenas, we alternate between self-filmed video diaries, verit√© documentary footage, and spectacularly filmed performances in an attempt to celebrate the healing power of movement and the spirit of human inventiveness.
title: The Hooping Life
